metadata.title: The Swiss Connection — Private Services from People Near You
metadata.description: Find skilled individuals offering private services in Switzerland. Haircuts, cleaning, repairs, tutoring, and more — no businesses, just real people with real talent.
metadata.keywords: services Switzerland, private services, haircuts Switzerland, house cleaning, repairs, tutoring, marketplace

home.heroSubtitle: Find skilled individuals offering personal services in Switzerland. No businesses — just real people with real talent.
home.step1Description: Browse service providers by category, location, or keyword. Filter by rating, price, and language.
home.step2Description: View provider profiles, check reviews, and send a message directly to discuss your needs.
home.step3Description: Arrange the service, then leave a review and recommendation to help the community.
home.ctaDescription: Are you a skilled professional? Create your provider profile and start connecting with people who need your services.
